Engineer I Job at Lagos University Teaching Hospital (LUTH)




        
    

        
        The Lagos University Teaching Hospital (LUTH) is a foremost tertiary hospital in Nigeria with a mandate to provide excellent services of international standard in patient care, training & research.

We invite applications from suitably qualified candidates for the position below:

Job Position: Engineer I

Job Location: Idi-Araba, Lagos

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Candidates must possess a Bachelor's Degree (BSc. /BTech.) in Mechanical, Electrical, Civil (Builder), Biomedical Engineering or relevant discipline with not less than Second Class Lower Division/Credit Grade from a recognised Institution.


Salary
CONHESS 08 (N2,094,793 - N2,873,068) / Annum and other allowances as approved by the Federal Government.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and Curriculum Vitae. The Applicant's Curriculum Vitae should include the following details:


	Full Names (Surname in Capital Letters or Underlined)
	Contact Address, Phone Number(s) and E-mail Address
	Date of Birth
	Gender
	Marital Status
	State of Origin
	Local Government Area
	Educational Background with Dates
	Qualifications Obtained with Dates
	Details of One Year Post Graduation Internship (if applicable)
	Details of NYSC (if applicable)
	Working Experience with Dates, Position Held and Organisation Name
	Achievements / Merits / Awards
	Name and Addresses of Three (3) Referees.


Candidates should forward three (3) sets of their Applications, detailed Curriculum Vitae and copies of Credentials and addressed to:
The Director of Administration,
Lagos University Teaching Hospital,
P.M.B. 12003, Idi-Araba,
Lagos, Nigeria.

Note


	Documents in support of the information provided in the Curriculum Vitae should be attached to the application.
	Applicants should request their referees to forward references on their behalf directly to "The Director of Administration, Lagos University Teaching Hospital, Idi-Araba, Lagos".
	LUTH does not appoint candidates with third class grades.

Job Position: Project Manager

About the Role


	We are seeking an experienced Project Manager (MEP) to join our team at Mar & Mor Engineering Services Limited.
	The ideal candidate will provide leadership in planning, execution, and delivery of MEP projects, ensuring they are completed safely, on time, within budget, and in compliance with quality standards.
